Translations.Text: They est upholders lies eaters illicit earnings they advenit vos scabinus them vos scabinus them vos disregard them! Vos choose disregard them they non harm vos in the parvus Si vos scabinus them vos scabinus equitably. DEUS loves those est equitable
Why they ask vos perfecit scabinus them when they habet Torah containing deus juris they chose disregard it They non est believers

Nos sent Torah containing guidance light Dominus prout it est Judaicus prophets alias prout rabbis sacerdotis dictated them in deus scripture prout testis them! Ergo non reverence human beings; vos reverence Me instead Non trade away My revelations cheap price Those non dominus prout deus revelations est disbelievers

Ac nos decretum them it ut vita vita eye eye nose nose ear ear tooth tooth equivalent injuria any injuria. 1 forfeits quod est due to eum prout charity it atone his sins Those non dominus prout deus revelations est the unjust
